text: "Stay a Little Longer" is a 1946 song by Bob Wills and His Texas Playboys. It went to number 3 in 1946, Willie Nelson covered it in 1973 and Mel Tillis covered in 1982. Category:1946 songs Category:Country songs Category:Merle Haggard songs Category:Willie Nelson songs Category:Mel Tillis songs Category:The Charlie Daniels Band songs
title: Stay a Little Longer
